summary: The 'Transformational Artificial intelligence to Modernize the Economy against Extreme Weather and Wildfires Act' (TAME) aims to enhance the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration's (NOAA) use of artificial intelligence for weather forecasting. It focuses on developing AI weather models, curating comprehensive training datasets, improving data dissemination, fostering public-private partnerships, and addressing wildfire risks. The bill also includes provisions for technical assistance, model assessment, and research into uncertainty quantification, as well as the sharing of data with the public. It includes authorization for appropriations.
